name: 林敬皇
objective:
資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.
schedule:
週次 / Week - 單元主題 / Topic
1. 工業控制系統資通安全概論
2.ICS 與物聯網安全管理
3. 物聯網與雲端安全雲端安全標準
4. 資安事件與威脅情資
5. 網頁應用程式安全簡介
6. 身分驗證與通行碼破解
materials: 自編教材 / Use of self-made materials
